# tsuru_plan (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "tsuru_plan" "plan1" {
  name = "plan1"
  cpu         = "1" or "100m" or "200%"
  memory     = "web"
  default = true
}
```
### Required

* `cpu` - (String)
* `memory` - (String)
* `name` - (String)

### Optional

* `default` - (Boolean)
* `id` - (String) The ID of this resource.
